biotools.summary: Given a minimum segment length and m sequences of length n drawn from an alphabet of size σ, create a segmentation in O(mn log σ) time and use various matching strategies to join the segment texts to generate founder sequences.

bioschemas.name: founder sequences
bioschemas.summary: Given a minimum segment length and m sequences of length n drawn from an alphabet of size σ, create a segmentation in O(mn log σ) time and use various matching strategies to join the segment texts to generate founder sequences.
